latestInspection.result: Inspection Result Initial Annual Inspection - Reinspection Required

infractions.Violation Summary: At time of inspection it was determined that child care service allows staff to perform their duties that are not healthy or are incapable of carrying out their duties Staff medical clearances are not maintained by child care service
infractions.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

infractions.Violation Summary: Child care service failed to provide or maintain record of staff immunizations

violations.Violation Summary: At time of inspection it was determined that individual associated with child care service/camp involved in an act detrimental to health and safety
violations.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards

violations.Violation Summary: At time of inspection hallways and other means of egress were observed obstructed and impassable
violations.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards

violations.Violation Summary: Permittee/applicant submitted incomplete written safety plan
violations.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

violations.Violation Summary: At time of inspection it was observed that child care service failed to provide appropriate guards on designated structures/equipment to protect children from potential injury
violations.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

violations.Violation Summary: At time of inspection child care service failed to provide soap and/or paper towels or sanitary dryers accessible to children at hand wash sinks
violations.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

violations.Violation Summary: Appropriate and clean cots linens and other sleeping arrangements not provided by child care service at time of inspection
violations.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations
